Class Employee

  • java.lang.Object
    • Employee
  • public class Employee
extends java.lang.Object
    Write a description of class Employee here.
    Version:
    (8/10/2019) The Employee class keeps track of the following information about the employee; Employee's Name, Number indicating order in which the employee was hired, a flag indicating whether the employee is still active and the Salary (a number that may contain decimal fraction).
    Author:
    (your Wazimu)
